description: The Peach-leaved Bellflower (Campanula persicifolia 'Chettle Charm') is an amazing perennial with its showy, large bell-shaped flowers in gorgeous shades of lavender and pink. Its graceful shape makes it an ideal choice for beds, borders, and containers. The beautiful dark-green foliage provides an excellent backdrop for the flowers and provides year-round interest. It also has an excellent resistance to heat and drought, tolerating a wide range of soil types. And best of all, it blooms all summer long, so you can enjoy its unique beauty in your garden or on your patio for months.
